Article Title: What is Squirrel White’s real name? Exploring the origins, career stats, and transfer that define his legacy
Article Text:
Squirrel White (Image credits: IG/X)

How Squirrel White’s childhood nickname grew into a powerful lifelong sporting identity

Career totals reveal consistency, explosiveness, and high-level production across multiple seasons

Breakout sophomore season at Tennessee highlighted his potential before injuries slowed progress

Why Squirrel White transferred to Florida State seeking a fresh start and opportunity

Final Florida State chapter offers redemption, recognition, and chance to honor hidden real name

Most fans know him as Squirrel White, but very few actually know the name on his birth certificate. Long before he became a rising wide receiver, his great-grandmother gave him the nickname after noticing his quick, darting movements as a baby in her garden. That playful moment shaped an identity so powerful that it eclipsed his given name, Marquarius Malik White, which now only surfaces on official rosters and records.Unlike many athletes who earn nicknames from teammates, White’s was born in family roots. Over time, “Squirrel” became synonymous with his personality and his game-breaking quickness. His elusiveness on the field mirrored the very creature he was compared to as an infant, making the nickname a natural extension of his playing style.Over the course of his college career, White has compiled roughly 133 receptions for 1,712 yards and six touchdowns across 38 games. These totals reflect a wideout who, when healthy, brings consistent value and the ability to swing momentum in his team’s favor.At 5’10” and 170 pounds (77 kilograms), he doesn’t overwhelm defenders with size, but his sudden acceleration makes him a dangerous slot receiver. He thrives on screens and short-yardage routes, turning small spaces into big plays with his agility and vision.One of his finest moments came in the 2023 Orange Bowl, where he exploded for nine catches, 108 yards, and a touchdown — the type of stage where nicknames turn into legacies.White’s breakout season came in 2023 with Tennessee, when he hauled in 67 passes for 803 yards, becoming one of the team’s most reliable playmakers. His performance turned heads across the SEC and underscored why fans gravitated toward both his skills and his unusual name.But 2024 brought adversity. A knee injury slowed his production, limiting him to 34 catches for 381 yards. For a player who relies on agility and explosiveness, it was a frustrating reminder of how quickly momentum can shift.After three seasons in Knoxville, White sought a fresh start. With just one year of eligibility left, he entered the transfer portal looking for a system where his speed and skill set would be maximized. Florida State offered exactly that — a stage big enough to showcase him once more, and an opportunity to reset his career before the NFL For Marquarius Malik White, the man behind the “Squirrel” nickname, the move to Florida State represents more than just a transfer. It’s the final chance to prove that both his nickname and his real name deserve to be remembered. From a playful moment in a garden to highlight-reel plays under the lights, his journey is a reminder that sometimes the stories behind the names are as compelling as the games themselves.Also read: Jaxon Smith-Njigba erupts on hot mic after Seahawks’ nullified touchdown, referee’s disappointed stare sends fans into frenzy
Article Summary: Marquarius malik white is a wide receiver for the florida state seminoles. His nickname, squirrel, was given to him by his great-grandmother as a baby. Over time, "squirrel" became synonymous with his personality and game-breaking quickness.

Article Title: WWE SmackDown results and highlights (9-26-2025): Cody Rhodes opens, The Viper makes an appearance, Tiffany Stratton retains championship, and More
Article Text:
SmackDown in Orlando (Image via WWE)

Opening Segment

Melo Don’t Miz (Carmelo Hayes & the Miz) vs. Street Profits (Angelo Dawkins & Montez Ford - WWE Tag Team Championship #1 Contender’s Match

Street Profits win via pinfall.

B-FAB & “Michin” Mia Yim vs. Giulia & Kiana James

Giulia & Kiana James win via pinfall.

Je’Von Evans vs. Sami Zayn - WWE United States Championship Open Challenge

Sami Zayn wins via pinfall.

Jade Cargill vs. Nia Jax vs. Tiffany Stratton - WWE Women’s Championship

Tiffany Stratton wins via pinfall.

The September 26 edition of Friday night SmackDown comes live from the Kia Center in Orlando, Florida. The night boasts some powerful additions, with Cody Rhodes set to open the show. While he was one of the few people, the show technically was opened by someone else. After a recap of WWE Wrestlepalooza, the show finally kicked off with Paul Heyman at the stage.The night started with Paul Heyman at the stage, who was mocking Cody Rhodes. Although not the opener, he was part of the segment, when Cody Rhodes came up to confront him. Soon, more people joined in with Bron Breakker and Bronson Reed in the fray. Rhodes ended up being the first one to throw the punch and he initially was able to hold his place, but The Vision was soon able to overwhelm him. Then none other than Randy Orton showed up and made quick work of Breakker, which left Rhodes to quickly deal with Reed to end the segment.The four of them face off against each other once more in a tag team fight. The Miz and Carmelo Hayes come up against each other only. A month since their match for the No. 1 Contender's match for the tag titles in August. While Miz tried to gain the upper hand at the beginning of the show, the Street Profits soon made their mark.At the end, Hayes hesitated to save his partner, and lost the match after a frog splash from Montez Ford on the Miz.The tag team match is a result of these four women trying to gain dominance over the other individually for the last couple weeks. B-Fab and Kiana James started the show. But the U.S. champion tagged in and took control when their opponents tried to double team James. A northern lights bomb from Giulia on Michin led to the duo of Giulia and Kiana James winning tonight.After a short scene with Charlotte Flair and Alexa Bliss, Drew McIntyre makes his entrance into the show. He talks about his loss to Rhodes at Wrestlepalooza and brings up Ryan Tran - who was the referee of the match. GM Nick Aldis comes in, as does Jacob Fatu - and words, and eventually blows are exchanged.Tiffany Stratton and Stephanie Vaquer, and then Dragon Lee and Sami Zayn also have small backstage bits, adding to the intrigue of the night. Solo Sikoa also cuts a promo with his MFT member - this time, ita JC Mateo.It's NXT champion Je’Von Evans is the one to accept Sami Zayn's open Challenge for the WWE United States Championship. They started slow, but Zayn ended up backing Je’Von Evans to the corner for some stiff chops. At the end, Zayn hits his opponent with the Blue Thunder Driver to retain his WWE United States Championship.The last match of the night was for the WWE Women’s Championship between Jade Cargill, Nia Jax, and Tiffany Stratton. All three women had their moments in the match, unfortunately, a series of mishaps became the undoing of this match. At the end, Stratton hits Jax with a Prettiest Moonsault Ever, retaining the WWE Women’s Championship.The night ends with Stephanie Vaquer facing off against her Crown Jewels opponent - the winner of the night, as both her and Tiffany Stratton hold up their championship belts to close the curtains.Also Read: Drew McIntyre in Highlander - Fantasy epic starring Henry Cavill gets new update with WWE star
Article Summary: The september 26 edition of smackdown comes live from the kia center in orlando, florida. The night boasts some powerful additions, with cody rhodes set to open the show. After a recap of wwe wrestlepalooza, the show finally kicked off with paul heyman at the stage.

Article Title: "Love island drama": Cam Newton blasts Tua Tagovailoa’s underwhelming Miami performance while highlighting team problems
Article Text:
Tua Tagovailoa (Image credits: IG/X)

Cam Newton highlights the contrast between Tua Tagovailoa’s potential and recent performance struggles

Off-field distractions likened to reality TV drama affecting team focus and results

Accountability remains, but Newton stresses Tua’s role in team struggles

Newton’s critique sparks debate about NFL pressures and quarterback scrutiny

Despite criticism, Newton expresses belief in Tua’s untapped capabilities

Cam Newton, speaking on ESPN's First Take, took aim at Tua Tagovailoa , pointing out that the Miami Dolphins quarterback has fallen short of expectations over the past year. Newton suggested that the team’s struggles go beyond simple statistics, hinting that off-field distractions are undermining performance. The former MVP compared the situation in Miami to a reality TV drama, emphasizing that the quarterback’s immense talent hasn’t been fully reflected on the field.“This Tua Tagovailoa that we have seen in the last 12 months, is not something and someone that is indicative of what we’ve seen before,” Newton said. He underlined the gap between Tua’s abilities and his current output, stressing that the quarterback is capable of much more. Newton’s perspective positions Tua’s underperformance as a combination of personal inconsistency and surrounding distractions, rather than a purely technical issue.Newton drew a striking comparison between the Dolphins’ current environment and the drama of Love Island. “When I see the situation that has taken place at Miami, it’s more 'Love Island drama' than football,” he remarked. By framing the off-field environment as a major disruptor, Newton suggested that the team’s focus and cohesion have suffered, making it harder for Tua to reach his potential.While Newton stopped short of placing full blame on Tagovailoa, he acknowledged that the quarterback is a key ingredient in the team’s challenges. “A large part, I wouldn’t say it’s all on Tua, but it is a main ingredient,” he said, emphasizing that leadership and performance from the quarterback position remain critical to Miami’s success. His assessment places Tua at the center of the narrative, while still considering other team issues within the franchise.The comments have fueled conversations across NFL circles about how talent, leadership, and distractions intersect. Newton’s candid remarks highlight the pressure on quarterbacks in high-profile teams, especially when expectations are high and performance dips. Fans and analysts alike are now debating how much off-field drama can influence results, and whether Tua can regain the form that made him a top-tier prospect.Even amid the critique, Newton conveyed confidence in Tua’s potential. He stressed that the quarterback has the tools and skill to rebound if focus returns to football fundamentals. The remarks suggest that Newton sees Miami’s current issues as a temporary setback rather than a permanent decline, highlighting the delicate balance between talent, environment, and consistency in the NFL.As the Dolphins navigate their early-season challenges, Newton’s observations serve as both a critique and a reminder of the high stakes surrounding elite quarterbacks. Tua’s next performances will be closely watched, not just for statistics, but for signs that he can rise above distractions and lead Miami back to contention.Also read: Jaxon Smith-Njigba erupts on hot mic after Seahawks’ nullified touchdown, referee’s disappointed stare sends fans into frenzy
Article Summary: Cam newton took aim at tua tagovailoa on espn's first take. The former mvp compared the situation in miami to a reality tv drama, emphasizing that the quarterback’s immense talent hasn’t been fully reflected on the field. The comments have fueled conversations about how talent, leadership, and distractions intersect.

Article Title: Ousmane Dembélé net worth in 2025: PSG star’s salary, career, family, endorsements, Ballon d’Or win
Article Text:
Ousmane Dembélé net worth in 2025: PSG star’s salary, career, family, endorsements, Ballon d’Or win (Image via getty)

Ousmane Dembélé net worth in 2025 and salary

Ousmane Dembélé football career with PSG

Ousmane Dembélé endorsements and business deals

Ousmane Dembélé family and early life

Ousmane Dembélé Ballon d’Or win and injury update

Ousmane Dembélé is a famous football player from France. He plays for Paris Saint-Germain (PSG). In 2025, he became very popular after winning the Ballon d’Or and helping PSG win the Champions League. Fans want to know about his net worth, salary, football career, family, and the latest news around him. Here is everything in very simple words, based only on updated and trusted reports.Ousmane Dembélé’s net worth in 2025 is about $35 million. He earns close to €18 million each year from PSG. His contract runs until 2028 and is worth around €60 million in total.He also makes nearly $10 million yearly from Adidas and other brand deals. Dembélé owns houses in Paris and Spain but keeps a low profile compared to many other football stars.Dembélé started his journey at Rennes in France. Then he played for Borussia Dortmund in Germany. In 2017, he moved to Barcelona for a record fee. PSG signed him in 2023. In the 2024–25 season, he scored more than 30 goals in all competitions. He also gave many assists.He helped PSG win their first ever Champions League title. In 2025, he was awarded the Ballon d’Or as the best male football player in the world.Ousmane Dembélé makes a lot of money from business deals and endorsements every year. In 2025, his income from big brands like Adidas and Nike is over $10 million yearly, apart from his PSG salary.Also Read: Andre Agassi And Steffi Graf Combined Net Worth 2025: Tennis Power Couple History, Fortune, Children, Legacy And More He earns from ads, clothing lines, video game covers, and social media promotions. After winning the Ballon d’Or, brands offered him even more new deals and partnerships. All these endorsements make him one of the top earners among footballers off the field.Ousmane was born in Vernon, France. His father is from Mali. His mother is from Mauritania and Senegal. His parents always supported his football dream.He married in 2021 and has a daughter born in 2022. He follows Islam and often talks about the value of family in his life. His family has been a strong support throughout his career.In 2025, Ousmane Dembélé became the main headline after winning the Ballon d’Or in Paris. He beat young Barcelona star Lamine Yamal and his PSG teammate Vitinha to the prize. In August 2025, he helped PSG win the UEFA Super Cup.In September 2025, he picked up a hamstring injury while playing for France. PSG confirmed he will miss a few weeks but is expected to return soon. Fans around the world are waiting for his comeback.
Article Summary: Ousmane dembélé’s net worth in 2025 is about $35 million. He earns close to €18 million each year from psg. His contract runs until 2028 and is worth around €60 million in total. In 2025, he was awarded the ballon d’or as the best male football player in the world.

Article Title: Explained: Super Over drama! Why was Dasun Shanaka given not out even after getting 'out'?
Article Text:
Super Over drama (Screengrab)

India enter another final but continue to be sloppy in the field | Concerns ahead of title clash

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Why was Dasun Shanaka given not out even after getting 'out'?

Arshdeep Singh bowled to Shanaka, India appealed for a caught-behind, and the on-field umpire gave him out.

Shanaka reviewed, and UltraEdge showed no bat-ball contact, overturning the caught-behind dismissal.

During the review, Shanaka ran for a single, and Samson hit the stumps with a direct throw.

The ball was dead once the umpire initially gave Shanaka out, so he could not be run out.

As a result, Shanaka remained not out, saved by the technicality in the laws of cricket.

In a dramatic Asia Cup 2025 clash between India and Sri Lanka that went down to a Super Over on Friday, one moment left fans and even players scratching their heads: Dasun Shanaka being given "not out" despite what seemed like a dismissal.During Sri Lanka’s Super Over after they amassed an exact 202/5 to tie the score, Arshdeep Singh bowled a near-perfect yorker to Shanaka on his fourth delivery.The ball whizzed past the bat, prompting an immediate appeal from Arshdeep and wicketkeeper Sanju Samson. Umpire Gazi Sohel raised his finger for caught behind.Shanaka, however, decided to review.Now, here’s where things got confusing.Even as the caught-behind appeal was being processed, Shanaka inexplicably set off for a run.Wicketkeeper Sanju Samson, quick to notice, threw down the stumps with a direct hit.India celebrated, believing Shanaka was gone either way.However, since the initial decision had already been given as “out caught behind”, the ball was considered dead at that very moment.That meant Shanaka could not also be run out in the same sequence of play.When the review overturned the caught-behind dismissal, Shanaka survived completely despite being short of his ground.The ruling might appear confusing, but it’s rooted in the MCC laws of cricket: once a batter is declared out, the ball is dead instantly. Even if that dismissal is later overturned via DRS, no subsequent mode of dismissal from that same delivery can apply.India’s fielders were visibly perplexed, with umpire Sohel taking time to explain the law. Shanaka, for his part, was fortunate.Ultimately, Sri Lanka managed just two runs in the Super Over, leaving India to chase a modest target which they did with ease.The incident will likely spark further debate on whether the rules need tweaking for scenarios involving DRS, but as of now, Shanaka was saved by nothing more than a technicality.
Article Summary: Sri lanka's dasun shanaka given not out despite being given 'out' by umpire. India bowled to shanaka, sri lanka appealed for a caught-behind, and the on-field umpire gave him out. Shanaka reviewed, and ultraedge showed no bat-ball contact. During the review, shanaka ran for a single, and sanju samson hit the stumps with a direct throw.

Article Title: What is Walker Kessler's net worth? Los Angeles Lakers eye NBA pro as Utah Jazz center nears free agency decision
Article Text:
Walker Kessler is a promising player (Image via Getty Images)

According to Sportac, as of 2023, Kessler has accumulated an outstanding net worth of $2 million in just his debut year.

Net worth and earnings of Utah Jazz center Walker Kessler

According to Sportac, as of 2023, Kessler has a net worth of $2 million.

Reports suggest that L.A. Lakers might pursue Walker Kessler in 2025–26

Lakers Daily

According to Lakers Daily, the Los Angeles Lakers will once more try to acquire Walker Kessler, a big man for the Utah Jazz. As per Tony Jones of The Athletic, Kessler will reportedly not accept a rookie-scale contract extension. He is a gifted player.Additionally, he had initially signed a rookie-scale contract with the Utah Jazz, for which he will receive $4.8 million next year. He is currently eligible for an extension, and recent similar center deals suggest that he could be worth approximately $25 million per annum.Tony Jones further claimed that Kessler and the Utah Jazz will not consent to a rookie-scale extension. Next summer, Kessler will be a restricted free agent. The Minnesota Timberwolves selected professional basketball player Walker Kessler with the 22nd overall choice in the first round of the 2022 NBA draft. In the NBA, he is now a center for the Utah Jazz.After his sophomore year, Kessler declared for the 2022 NBA draft while playing collegiate basketball for the Auburn Tigers. Kessler has established himself as a formidable inside presence for the Jazz in his rookie campaign, securing a starting position with his defensive power.Now recently, rumors said that Walker Kessler might join the L.A. Lakers.Walker Kessler inked a rookie contract for $13.3 million over four years with the Jazz in 2022. This includes the guaranteed $5.5 million. Club options for the following two years were exercised. Furthermore, Kessler's 2024-25 pay is $2.9 million, and it will rise to $4.8 million the following season.He will be eligible to sign a restricted free agent contract following the 2025–2026 season. According to sources, Kessler had a net worth of $2 million in 2023, despite the fact that there isn't much information about his fortune available online.By now, his pay would have grown, and it is anticipated that it will raise even more when his rookie contract expires and he signs his second league contract.Even if the Los Angeles Lakers have a squad that could be able to contend for a championship this season, there is still room for improvement.In order to obtain some value for him, the Jazz may either give Kessler a qualifying offer during the winter or move him before he becomes a restricted free agent next summer. According to a league source, the Lakers might try to acquire Kessler in the future season, as they have done recently. Kessler has been the target of previous Lakers trade attempts as well.The Auburn product has a high asking price in Utah. Talking about him, the Lakers Daily wrote:“The Utah Jazz have a high asking price for Walker Kessler… One source toldthat the Lakers would have to part ways with Austin Reaves and multiple first-round picks to acquire Kessler.”It further stated:"A league source told Lakers Daily that the Lakers will attempt to trade for Kessler again during the 2025-26 season.. LAL tried to trade for Kessler the past two seasons."During the previous season, Kessler averaged 11.1 points on 66.3% field goal shooting, 12.2 rebounds, and 2.4 blocks per game. The 24-year-old is an incredible rebounder and shot blocker, but he isn't a real offensive danger.Also read: LeBron James to the Golden State Warriors? Franchise reportedly made multiple calls to Los Angeles Lakers over potential trade
Article Summary: Utah jazz center walker kessler has a net worth of $2 million, according to sportac. The 24-year-old signed a rookie contract for $13.3 million over four years with the jazz in 2022. He will be eligible to sign a restricted free agent contract following the 2025–2026 season.

Article Title: NFL trade rumors: NFL insider weighs in on Kirk Cousins’ future amid Atlanta Falcons' quarterback controversy
Article Text:
Kirk Cousins has not broken his silence amid the drama.(Image via Kevin Sabitus/Getty)

NFL insider weighs in on how Kirk Cousins can be linked to three teams amid Raheem Morris’ controversial statement



Kirk Cousins has stayed away from making any statements about his future in the league



The Atlanta Falcons’ quarterback and one of the most popular players in the league, Kirk Cousins, is in a pretty awkward situation with his team. While there have been many speculations about Kirk Cousins’ time as a starter is now over because of Michael Penix Jr. , the Atlanta Falcons’ head coach, Raheem Morris, made things clear recently. Amid this, NFL insider Nate Davis thinks there might be a few teams that could sign Kirk Cousins.A few hours ago, the Atlanta Falcons’ head coach, Raheem Morris shocked fans as he said, “Kirk lost his job last year. We’re not even close to that with Mike [Penix]...”The head coach added, “He had a bad day. We had a bad day. Mike is our quarterback. We got a lot of confidence in Mike. We’re moving forward with Mike. Mike’s the guy.”While this has sparked chaos among fans, NFL insider USA Today’s Nate Davis weighed in on Kirk Cousins’ situation and linked him to possibly three teams.USA Today’s Nate Davis wrote, "Acquiring him would be a break-glass-in-case-of-emergency situation….It would also require ample cap room from potential suitors given Cousins would be owed the prorated version of the $27.5 million he’s owed in base salary this season.”Nate Davis also weighed in on Kirk Cousins nearing 40 and recovering from his Achilles surgery. He added, “The conditions would certainly be specific – especially since Cousins’ no-trade clause permits him to kill any deal – but if a team like the Lions, Rams or Seahawks suddenly found itself with a long-term need behind center and lacking sufficient confidence that in-house backups could persevere for an extended period. "Amid all the mess that the Atlanta Falcons’ quarterback, Kirk Cousins, has found himself in, he has stayed silent and has not made any statements about his current situation.The Atlanta Falcons have not had a good start in the new season as the team ended up losing in the first match against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and in its last match against the Carolina Panthers.With the Atlanta Falcons gearing up for a match against the Washington Commanders, all eyes are on the team.Also Read: “He pulled his d*ck out and licked my ears”: Stefon Diggs faces serious sexual assault allegations from Chris Blake Griffith as Cardi B defends her boyfriend
Article Summary: Nfl insider weighs in on how kirk cousins can be linked to three teams amid raheem morris’ controversial statement. Nfl insider nate davis thinks there might be a few teams that could sign kirk cousins. Cousins has stayed away from making any statements about his future in the league.

Article Title: ‘Too blessed’ Brittany Mahomes shows Sterling driving baby Golden and Bronze as Patrick Mahomes fights to save Chiefs’ season
Article Text:
Brittany Mahomes posted a viral clip of Sterling driving baby Golden and Bronze at home as Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs prepare for a crucial Week 4 matchup against the Baltimore Ravens. (Image via Getty | People)

Brittany Mahomes shares family moment while Patrick Mahomes faces early season pressure with Kansas City Chiefs

Gilbert Arenas blames Taylor Swift for Travis Kelce’s slow start and Patrick Mahomes’ struggles with the Kansas City Chiefs

Gilbert Arenas RETURNS To The Arena to Preview Week 4

Brittany Mahomes, wife of Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes , shared a viral Instagram video of her three kids ahead of a pivotal Week 4 game. Brittany posted a clip of 4-year-old Sterling behind the wheel of a luxury mini car with baby Golden in the passenger seat and 2-year-old Bronze riding in the back. She captioned the video “too blessed” as the siblings cruised through the Mahomes’ home.The post comes as the Chiefs prepare for a critical matchup against the Baltimore Ravens on Sunday night at Arrowhead Stadium. Kansas City is 1-2 and risks falling to 1-3 if it loses, a scenario that could threaten its bid for a 10th straight AFC West title. Brittany, who recently turned 30 and celebrated with friends including Taylor Swift , has stayed busy balancing game days and parenting while Patrick tries to stabilize a shaky start to the season.Kansas City’s slow start has made Sunday night’s game feel like a must-win. A loss would leave the defending division champions chasing the standings in October. The Baltimore Ravens arrive with the same 1-2 record after losing on Monday night but still bring a physical defense and a hungry roster.Former NFL quarterback Derek Carr said on the “Home Grown Network,” “I got the Ravens… You do not think that there is some toughness in that building that has been established.”The comment reflects a growing belief that Baltimore’s defense and rushing attack could push around Kansas City if the Chiefs do not find rhythm.Patrick Mahomes has faced uneven offensive production. Wide receivers Rashee Rice and Xavier Worthy have been unavailable due to injuries, forcing Mahomes to lean heavily on Travis Kelce , who has started slow. The star tight end dropped a key pass that became a late interception in a 20-17 loss to the Philadelphia Eagles last week and was caught in a sideline confrontation with head coach Andy Reid during the Week 3 win over the New York Giants.Former NBA player Gilbert Arenas added fuel to the narrative surrounding Kansas City’s offense. On his show “The Arena Gridiron,” Arenas said, “[Mahomes] lost his tight end to a woman. … Kelce done lost his name. The Gen Zs know him as what? Taylor Swift’s boyfriend.”Taylor Swift has been tied to any dip in Travis Kelce’s performance since their relationship became public in 2023. Kelce has 10 catches for 134 yards and one touchdown through three games, far below his usual pace. Arenas pointed out that Patrick Mahomes is missing key targets and operating with a depleted receiving group, making the offense easier to defend.The Chiefs need both Mahomes and Kelce to deliver against the Ravens to avoid a damaging 1-3 start. Fans will be watching Arrowhead Stadium closely Sunday night, and waiting to see if Brittany shares another family moment as her husband tries to keep Kansas City’s season alive.
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes shared a viral instagram video of her three kids ahead of a pivotal week 4 game. Kansas city is 1-2 and risks falling to 1-3 if it loses, a scenario that could threaten its bid for a 10th straight afc west title. Former nba player gilbert arenas blamed taylor swift for travis kelce’s slow start and patrick mahomes’ struggles.

Where to watch the 2025 NBA Preseason?

Where to stream the 2025 NBA Preseason?

Also Read:

How to watch the 2025 NBA Preseason for free?

The 2025 NBA preseason is all set to begin, giving fans an early taste of what to expect before the regular season. This is the time when teams test their rosters, try out new lineups, and prepare for the long season ahead. Notably, the preseason games may not count in the standings, but they often give fans an idea about how their favorite team will perform. For young players and new signings, it is the first chance to prove themselves on the big stage. For coaches, it is the time to experiment with new strategies, and as for fans, it is the first opportunity to see fresh faces, star returns, and exciting matchups before the real action begins!The NBA preseason kicks off on Thursday, October 2. The opening game will be played in Abu Dhabi between the Philadelphia 76ers and the New York Knicks at 12 p.m. ET. The preseason will conclude on October 17, giving fans more than two weeks of basketball action before the regular season.Thursday, October 2Friday, October 3Saturday, October 4Sunday, October 5Monday, October 6Tuesday, October 7Wednesday, October 8Thursday, October 9Friday, October 10Saturday, October 11Sunday, October 12Monday, October 13Tuesday, October 14Wednesday, October 15Thursday, October 16Friday, October 17Most preseason games will be broadcast live on NBA TV, regional sports networks, and NBA League Pass.A few key games will also air on ESPN, ESPN2, and TNT.Games shown on ESPN, TNT, and NBA TV can be streamed on platforms like YouTube TV or Fubo TV. The NBA League Pass will also stream many games live and on demand.Some teams broadcast preseason games for free. The Sacramento Kings stream games on Kings.com, while the Phoenix Suns air games on Arizona’s Family channels (KTVK, KPHE-LD). Free trials on Fubo or DIRECTV Stream also give short-term access.
Article Summary: The 2025 nba preseason starts on september 6. The schedule is as follows: philadelphia 76ers vs. new york knicks at 12 p.m. Et (espn) phoenix suns vs. los angeles lakers at 10:00 p.m. Et. The 2025 nba preseason kicks off on thursday, october 2. The opening game will be played in abu dhabi between the philadelphia 76ers and the new york knicks.

Article Title: Who is Russell Henley’s wife Teil Duncan? Meet the acclaimed artist from Georgia who stole the golfer’s heart
Article Text:
Russell Henley is married to celebrated artist Teil Duncan (Image via: Getty Images)

Who is Russell Henley's wife Teil Duncan?

How Russell Henley and Teil Duncan first met and tied the knot

Inside Russell Henley and Teil Duncan’s family life with three children

“puts steel in his spine,”

Russell Henley has been on fire in 2025, earning his spot on Team USA for the Ryder Cup. But while his game has the spotlight, fans are just as curious about the woman who’s been cheering him on from the sidelines: his wife, Teil Duncan. She’s not just “the golfer’s wife” either; Teil is an established artist with a style and career that stand completely on their own.Russell Henley is married to Teil Duncan. Teil Duncan is an artist and hails from Columbus, Georgia. Duncan was born in 1988 and majored in Art at Auburn University. She had been a keen follower of art and became very popular due to her daring and colorful paintings.Her pieces, which are occasionally adorned with beach, people, and lively abstractions, have gotten her the chances to collaborate with the likes of Anthropologie and Abercrombie and Fitch.She has started her own creative company, Teil Paintings & Patterns and has extended her designs into fabrics and wall coverings. She is also a book author and published a book, The Color Teil, which is a glimpse into her artistic journey for her fans.Their story starts in 2013 at a wedding. Teil’s sister married one of Russell’s childhood friends, and that’s where the two first crossed paths. Things moved quickly and by 2014, they were engaged, and in October 2015, they said “I do” in Georgia.Since then, Teil has been by Russell’s side through the highs and lows of professional golf.The couple doesn’t share a ton publicly, but they’re raising three kids together: Robert, Ruth, and Jane. After his win at the 2025 Arnold Palmer Invitational, Russell even called Teil the one whobalancing family life while building her own career.Their home life in Georgia looks pretty different from the intensity of the PGA Tour, and is more about family time, creativity, and parenting three little ones.At the end of the day, Russell may bring home the trophies, but Teil is a star in her own right. Between her growing art empire and their life with three kids, the Henleys are proof that there’s more to a sports star’s story than what happens on the course.
Article Summary: Russell henley is married to celebrated artist teil duncan. Duncan was born in 1988 and majored in art at auburn university. She has started her own creative company, teil paintings & patterns. She is also a book author and published a book the color teil.

Article Title: Tallon Griekspoor net worth in 2025: Tennis career, prize money, family and more
Article Text:
Tallon Griekspoor net worth in 2025: Tennis career, prize money, family and more (Image via Getty)

Tallon Griekspoor net worth in 2025

Tallon Griekspoor’s latest wins



Tallon Griekspoor’s ranking and career

Tallon Griekspoor’s family support

Tallon Griekspoor’s calm side

Tallon Griekspoor is a tennis player from the Netherlands. In 2025, he is known for his strong shots and calm play. Many fans want to know how much money he has made, how high he is ranked, and who supports him at home. Tallon Griekspoor has faced injuries but always comes back. His story in 2025 is about family, focus, and big wins.Tallon Griekspoor has made more than $6.59 million in prize money in his career. His net worth in 2025 is about $3 million. Most of this money comes from tennis. Some comes from sponsors. Tallon Griekspoor works with Wilson for rackets. He also works with Lotto for shoes and clothes.In June 2025, Tallon Griekspoor won the Mallorca Championships in Spain. He beat Corentin Moutet in the final. He did not lose a set in the whole tournament.This win was big because Tallon Griekspoor had just stopped his French Open match with injury. In March 2025, he shocked fans at Indian Wells. He beat Alexander Zverev, who was ranked in the top five.In September 2025, Tallon Griekspoor is ranked number 31 in the world. His best ranking was number 21 in November 2023. He has won three ATP singles titles.He has also won two doubles titles. Tallon Griekspoor turned pro in 2015. He plays powerful tennis and improves each season.Tallon Griekspoor was born into a sports family. His father, Ron Griekspoor, was a motocross racer. His mother, Monique Griekspoor, is a tennis coach. His twin brothers, Scott Griekspoor and Kevin Griekspoor, also played tennis.The family runs a civil engineering company in the Netherlands. They have always supported Tallon Griekspoor in his tennis career.Also Read: “She Despises Him”: Martina Navratilova Fuels Controversy With Comment On Melania Trump’s Viral Expression Toward Donald Trump Tallon Griekspoor is calm on the court. He does not celebrate too much after big wins. He likes to stay focused on the next match. He spends time with his family when he is not playing.In 2025, his win in Mallorca and his upset of Alexander Zverev made fans proud. Tallon Griekspoor showed that focus and family support bring success.
Article Summary: Tallon griekspoor is a tennis player from the netherlands. In 2025, he is known for his strong shots and calm play. He has made more than $6.59 million in prize money in his career. His net worth in 2025 is about $3 million.

Article Title: Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen’s friendship has been shattered since 2004 despite Chicago Bulls’ historic championship run
Article Text:
Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen of the Chicago Bulls speak during a game against the Philadelphia 76ers (Image Source - Getty Images)

John Salley says Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen ’s friendship ended for good in 2004

Michael Jordan did not receive condolences from Scottie Pippen after his father’s murder

Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen’s relationship has been strained by personal conflicts

Scottie Pippen describes his bond with Michael Jordan

Scottie Pippen and Michael Jordan had an amazing chemistry when they were together on the court, but when one considers their relationship outside the field, the situation becomes a little bit tricky. They have had their share of both personal misunderstandings and open quarrels with each other, which have kept them at least a couple of decades asunder. Ex-teammates and analysts indicate that they might not have been so close as fans imagine they might not even recover their friendship.John Salley, a four-time NBA champion who briefly played alongside both in Chicago, claims that the friendship between Jordan and Pippen effectively came to an end in 2004. In an interview on "The OGs" podcast in April 2025, Salley revealed that he recognized their relationship was over by 2004, noting a long-standing rift that had started before their public conflicts.In another conversation in April 2025, Salley explained that the rift had been resolved for quite a while, and he was skeptical about any chance of reconciliation. This was the point where their relationship began to break down, driven by Pippen's sense of being overshadowed.Even back when they were playing, there were some tensions. Pippen often felt like he wasn't getting the recognition he deserved, particularly when it came to the team's achievements. In his 2021 book "Unguarded," Pippen brought up the murder of Jordan's father in 1993, but he didn't express any condolences at that moment, which later sparked some controversy.Dennis Rodman, a former teammate, said in a December 2024 interview that he never had conversations with Jordan or Pippen when they weren't playing, which shows how business-oriented their relationship was. He reiterated this in a January 2025 statement, making it clear that their bond was solely focused on the game.A significant personal matter traces back to 1993, when Jordan's dad was murdered. Stephen A. Smith disclosed in a March 2024 segment on ESPN's "First Take" that Jordan felt betrayed since Pippen didn't reach out with condolences. Smith repeated this in April 2024, stating that Jordan felt pain over Pippen's deliberate lack of sympathy during that time.During a January 2025 interview, Pippen referred to Jordan as a "very difficult person" when discussing attitude challenges. Later, in June 2025, Pippen made a startling comment regarding their relationship, stressing its intricacy. Furthermore, the breakup in March 2025 between Pippen's ex-wife Larsa and Jordan's son Marcus added more layers, as Marcus spoke out about substance issues.In the Marca interview on September 24, 2025, Pippen talked about his connection with Jordan as "never been on the top shelf," blaming it on the business and life cycles. Craig Hodges, a former Bulls teammate, talked about the pivotal moment in their relationship on a May 2025 episode of the "All the Smoke" podcast, encouraging them to make amends by saying, "We too old for that sh*t."According to a Newsweek article from May 2025, Hodges was seen asking Jordan and Pippen to fix their differences. However, Salley voiced his doubts about a possible reconciliation in April 2025. A poll on X in September 2025 questioned if they could mend their relationship like Magic Johnson and Isiah Thomas.Users on X had their different opinion regarding this matter like one user commented, "Scottie still milking Jordan’s name 😂" while other said, "It's like every 5 years he wanna get honest and speak on his relationship about his co workers from the 90s cmon let's move on season soon start". While some other fan brought his stat by commenting, "Pippen shot 34% in the 1996 finals btw".Their friendship has shattered to the extent that some believes that it will never be the same ever again. One user said, "Mike will never forgive Pipen".Also Read: Kyrie Irving is ahead of plan in ACL rehab and could return stronger than anyone expects this season Even with their legendary journey, the bond between Michael Jordan and Pippen is still broken, stemming from work-related grudges and personal mistakes dating back to 2004. Pippen recognizes Jordan's brilliance but keeps his distance. This story gives us an example that even after winning multiple championships it does not mean that the team get along with each other without any problems or conflicts.
Article Summary: Ex-teammates and analysts indicate that they might not have been so close as fans imagine. John salley, a four-time nba champion who briefly played alongside both in chicago, claims that the friendship between jordan and pippen effectively came to an end in 2004. A significant personal matter traces back to 1993, when jordan's dad was murdered.

Article Title: Tyrese Haliburton's fiancée Jade Jones adds oomph to NBA star's shoe release day with a stylish pose
Article Text:
Tyrese Haliburton with fiancée Jade Jones (Image Source: Jade Jones/Instagram)

Tyrese Haliburton’s fiancée Jade Jones celebrates his Puma shoe’s release

Jade Jones posed stylishly in Tyrese Haliburton's Puma Hali 1 shoes (Source: Jade Jones/ IG Story)

Jade Jones gave a glimpse of fans’ response to Hali Mart

Jade Jones gives glimpse of Hali Mart and its hype among fans (Image Source: Jade Jones/IG Story)

Tyrese Haliburton’s Puma Hali 1 shoe got released at a promotional event, Hali Mart, on Thursday. His fiancée Jade Jones took to her Instagram story to extend support to him on the shoe release day. She posted some pictures where she is seen rocking the casual look, with Hali 1 shoe being the star attraction in those.Apart from the shoe release, Haliburton, in collaboration with Puma, also organized a one-day event called Hali Mart on September 26. The pop-up shop mirrored Haliburton’s playful attitude and love for sports. It saw a thundering response from the fans who lined up in huge numbers to get access to the exclusive look.Jade Jones was on cloud nine as her fiancé’s Puma Hali 1 shoe hit the stands. She played fan girl for the release event and struck stylish poses wearing the newly released shoes. These shoes have been released in limited numbers.Giving an idea about their exclusivity, Jade captioned one of her pictures that she posted on her IG story as:“317 pairs of these today!!!Hali is (fire emoji)”Jade kept her hair open and in a natural look for the stylish pictures in Puma Hali 1 shoes.She chose to go all casual with a grey button-up top and shorts. In another picture, the caption read, “First in line @jadeejones,” which beautifully captured the excitement Jade felt at the occasion.Tyrese Haliburton also hosted another promotional event in collaboration with Puma. It was a one-day pop-up shop where Haliburton’s all things of interest, ranging from groceries to basketball supplies, etc., were showcased. Jade Jones took to her IG story to give a peek into the fans’ response to the event. The fans visited the shop in huge numbers and were captured waiting in line in one of Jade’s IG stories.Jade extended her full support to her fiancé at his special event. The couple got engaged in July when Tyrese went down on his knee and popped the question to his lady love in a dreamily planned proposal setting. They are often spotted attending sporting events together.Tyrese Haliburton is on the road to recovery from his Achilles tendon surgery. He hopes to come back to the court soon. Whether he will be playing in the early half of the upcoming season or join the Indiana Pacers later remains to be seen. Meanwhile, the couple must also busy preparing for their wedding day, as they have committed to spending their lives together.Also Read: Jade Jones gives a glimpse of her love life with fiancé Tyrese Haliburton on Instagram
Article Summary: Tyrese haliburton’s puma hali 1 shoe got released at a promotional event, hali mart, on thursday. His fiancée jade jones took to her instagram story to extend support to him. The couple got engaged in july when tyrese went down on his knee.

Article Title: Former Lions defensive line coach Terrell Williams diagnosed with prostate cancer, begins treatment
Article Text:
AP Photo/Doug Murray

Details of Terrell Williams’ prostate cancer diagnosis, treatment plan, and immediate impact on Patriots coaching duties

What this means for the Patriots’ defensive strategy and team dynamics moving forward

New England Patriots defensive coordinator Terrell Williams, who previously served as the defensive line coach for the Detroit Lions, has been diagnosed with prostate cancer. The news was confirmed by Patriots head coach Mike Vrabel on September 26, 2025. Williams, 51, has already begun treatment and is consulting with medical specialists to determine the best approach for recovery. The announcement has sent waves through the NFL community, with teammates, coaches, and fans expressing their support for Williams and his family during this challenging time.According to Patriots sources, Williams began treatment soon after his diagnosis and is working closely with medical specialists. While he has not yet publicly addressed the news, the team confirmed that linebackers coach Zak Kuhr has stepped in to call defensive plays during Williams’ absence. The organization is providing full support while Williams focuses on his health and recovery.Williams has built a respected coaching career over decades in the NFL. Before joining the Patriots in 2025 as defensive coordinator, he served as the Lions’ defensive line coach during the 2024 season.His experience also includes stints with the Oakland Raiders, Miami Dolphins, and Tennessee Titans. Known for his defensive expertise and leadership, Williams has been instrumental in developing top NFL talent across multiple teams.While Williams is undergoing treatment, the Patriots have adjusted coaching responsibilities to maintain continuity on defense. His expertise remains central to the team’s strategy, and the organization is focused on supporting both him and the coaching staff. Fans and teammates alike have shown solidarity, highlighting the respect and admiration Williams commands in professional football.Terrell Williams’ prostate cancer diagnosis is a sobering reminder of the personal challenges faced by NFL coaches and players. While treatment has begun and the road ahead may be difficult, the football community has rallied around Williams, offering support and encouragement. The Patriots and the wider NFL are keeping him in their thoughts, and Williams is expected to address the public when he feels ready, continuing to inspire fans both on and off the field.Also read - "Cincy is nothing without you": Fans react to Joe Burrow’s latest Instagram post that will break your heart but lift Bengals fans’ spirits
Article Summary: New england patriots defensive coordinator terrell williams has been diagnosed with prostate cancer. The news was confirmed by patriots head coach mike vrabel on september 26, 2025. Williams has already begun treatment and is consulting with medical specialists to determine the best approach for recovery.

Article Title: "She was my everything" - Kendrick Perkins beloved grandmother passes away at 90
Article Text:
Kendrick Perkins (Image via X)

Kendrick Perkins gets emotional at his grandmother's passing

Kendrick Perkins' Instagram story

Kendrick Perkins had lost his grandfather when he was 29

Kendrick Perkins recently took to his Instagram to post about the passing of his beloved grandmother, who was 90 years old. His grandmother, Mary Lewis, was the one to raise him alongside her husband, Raymond Peter Lewis Sr. Perkins had lost his mother early in life, when he was only 5 years old. And then came his grandparents, who took the responsibility of not just raising him, but being by his side through everything in life.Kendrick Perkins is undoubtedly upset at the passing of his grandmother. Mary Lewis, who was 90 at the time of her passing, held a very important place in Perkins' life. Throughout his early childhood days, to him getting drafted in the NBA , to his successful career which he now continues as an analyst. Through all of that, he had his grandmother, who had his back through all of that“Tomorrow I lay my Grandma to rest and although she was blessed to see 90 years on this earth… just don’t know if I’m fully prepared to let go. She was my Everything. Believed in me when nobody gave me chance, had my back 100% no matter what and her love and protection was like no other. Man I’m going to miss that woman 🙏🏾😢💔”Perkins was put up for adoption after the passing of his mother. But because his grandparents decided to take responsibility he remained with his family. Unfortunately, he now has to say his final goodbyes to his grandmother.Kendrick Perkins has now lost both his grandparents in life. He lost his grandfather when he was 29, and now his grandmother at 40 years old. His grandfather, Raymond Peter Lewis Sr. was 78 years old at the time of his passing. In fact, he died just a day after Perkins celebrated his 29th birthday.His grandfather was a big supporter of his athletic interests, especially basketball, and played a key role in Perkins' competitive journey. He was proud of all that he had achieved as a professional basketball player and Perkins has at times spoken of how much they both - Raymond Peter Lewis Sr. and Mary Lewis backed him throughout his life.Also Read: 3 NBA stars who have stunned with jaw-dropping body transformations ahead of 2025-26 season
Article Summary: Kendrick perkins lost his grandmother, mary lewis, who was 90 years old. His grandfather, raymond peter lewis sr. was 78 years old at the time of his passing. Perkins had lost his mother early in life, when he was only 5 years old and was put up for adoption.

Article Title: Jake Knapp’s girlfriend Makena White passes away at 28, golf community pays tribute
Article Text:
Jake Knapp’s girlfriend Makena White passes away at 28, golf community pays tribute (Image Via Getty)

Makena White remembered with love by family, friends and golf community



“so deeply missed”

"one of a kind"

Jake Knapp’s career and their relationship



The golf world is mourning after the sudden death of Makena White, the 28-year-old girlfriend of PGA Tour golfer Jake Knapp. On September 26, 2025, one of her closest friends uploaded on Makena's Instagram page. The post verified her death earlier in the week, stunning her family, friends, and the golf community. Her loved ones have asked for privacy, and no additional information was provided.In the Instagram post, Makena’s friend wrote that she will beby her father, her family, her friends, and her two dogs, Nelly and Fergie.The tribute hailed her asand noted that being loved by her was a real present full of laughter, joy, and indelible memories.The invitation further urged people to commemorate her by contributions to the Bruyère Brain Health & Memory Clinic or the Griffin Bell Endowment Fund.Tributes began to flood in from fans and golf world members soon after the post went up. CBS Sports reporter Amanda Balionis recalled Makena as a bringer of light to every room.She wrote that meeting and knowing Makena had been one of her favorite parts of the past year.The outpouring of grief showed how deeply she touched people’s lives in such a short time.Also Read: Danica Patrick delivers chilling warning on Jimmy Kimmel’s ABC future after Charlie Kirk remarks Thirty-one-year-old Jake Knapp has kept quiet ever since the report was made public. He and Makena first hid their relationship undercover in August 2023. Golf buffs started to know her when she backed his side during some of the most important events of his career.Knapp captured his first PGA Tour championship in February 2024 at the Mexico Open; Makena was with him. On the eighteenth green, many people gave their emotional embrace.Shooting a bogey-free 59 at the Cognizant Classic in March 2025, she also assisted him to reach one of the highlights of the season.Makena White's surprise death has rocked her fans, relatives, and golf community. She is remembered for her compassion, her spirit, and the joy she brought into so many lives even in grieving.
Article Summary: Makena white, the 28-year-old girlfriend of pga tour golfer jake knapp, died on september 26, 2025. A friend confirmed her death in an instagram post. She is remembered for her compassion, her spirit, and the joy she brought into so many lives.

Article Title: “It’s all too much”: Travis Kelce faces added pressure from Taylor Swift engagement and heated NFL season

People closely watch if he handles the pressure.

Article Title: Injury scare for India? Bowling coach Morne Morkel shares updates on Abhishek Sharma and Hardik Pandya
Article Text:
Abhishek Sharma and Hardik Pandya (AP Photo/Altaf Qadri)

TimesofIndia.com in Dubai:

India enter another final but continue to be sloppy in the field | Concerns ahead of title clash

Team India’s bowling coach Morne Morkel has shared an injury update on all-rounder Hardik Pandya and opener Abhishek Sharma ahead of their summit clash against Pakistan at the Dubai International Stadium on Sunday.Hardik, who bowled the first over of Sri Lanka’s innings and picked up a wicket, left the field and never returned. Meanwhile, Abhishek, who smashed a blazing 31-ball 61 with the bat, left the ground in the 9.2 over.“Both of them struggled with cramps during the game,” Morkel told reporters.“Hardik will be assessed tonight and tomorrow morning, and we’ll make a call on that. But both of them were just struggling with cramps during the game. Abhishek is fine,” he said.In a match that swung both ways, India held their nerve in the Super Over to stay unbeaten in the tournament.Morkel felt it was a good wake-up call for the team, as they have not been clinical so far.“I don’t think in this tournament we’ve played the complete game,” he admitted.“After every game there are discussions on areas we’d like to improve. With batting, can we rotate strike better in tough conditions, run harder between the wickets, and protect partnerships? From a bowling perspective, we need to sharpen our lengths, accuracy and decision-making in the first 10 overs, and be smarter in using variations like the yorker during the middle phase.“In the field, we’ve worked hard on catching under lights, so maybe it’s just a confidence issue. Across departments, there’s still work to be done. We are by no means the finished article, and we know that.”Morkel also revealed that after a gruelling match, the team will have an off day before the final, with only individual pool sessions and recovery work.“The key for the boys is to rest,” he said. “They’re already in ice baths, and recovery started right after the match. The best way to recover is sleep and staying off your feet. There will be pool sessions and massages before they get mentally ready for Sunday’s big battle. It’s a quick turnaround, and playing smart is going to be the key. There will certainly be no training.”
Article Summary: Hardik pandya and abhishek sharma both struggled with cramps. Both bowled the first over of sri lanka’s innings and picked up a wicket. India held their nerve in the super over to stay unbeaten in the tournament.

Article Title: Sanath Jayasuriya hails Abhishek Sharma, slams loophole in cricket law after Super Over drama
Article Text:
Abhishesk Sharma and Dasun Shanaka (AP Photo/Altaf Qadri)

TimesofIndia.com in Dubai:

India enter another final but continue to be sloppy in the field | Concerns ahead of title clash

The Super Over Controversy

Sri Lanka head coach Sanath Jayasuriya praised Abhishek Sharma and Pathum Nissanka , while questioning the "grey areas" in cricket after a controversial Super Over incident in the last Super Four match of the Asia Cup."Abhishek Sharma is playing his natural game, and they have encouraged him to play his natural game. That's the key, because if someone is playing naturally, we need to encourage him to continue that," Jayasuriya told reporters after the match."But whenever he wants to slow down, he knows how to do that as well. After six overs, if he wants to bat longer, he’s managing it. Day by day, he’s getting experience and batting really well. The good thing is that the coaching staff has given him the license to play his natural game. That's the key," he added.Abhishek scored a blazing 61, almost cancelled out by Pathum Nissanka, whose 107 off 58 balls brought Sri Lanka close to victory."I think Pathum played a brilliant innings to get that total, but unfortunately, he got out on the first ball of the last over. That was a bit unfortunate. But right through those 20 overs, he batted really well to get 100 and put 202 runs on the board.Unfortunately, his dismissal in the last over proved to be the turning point," he said.Jayasuriya also explained why centurion Pathum Nissanka didn’t bat in the Super Over."He was carrying a hamstring injury during the last two games and we were a little worried about him," he revealed.In the Super Over, drama unfolded with a bizarre incident. Arshdeep Singh struck on the first ball, dismissing Kusal Perera . On the fourth delivery, Dasun Shanaka missed, and Sanju Samson pouched it cleanly as Arshdeep appealed for caught behind. The umpire raised his finger despite no edge, even as Samson threw down the stumps for a run-out. Sri Lanka argued the ball was dead once the caught-behind decision was given, and the umpire agreed, overturning the run-out. It mattered little, as Shanaka fell on the very next ball."I think that’s just the rules. According to the rules, if you appeal for the catch, then Dasun had to go by the third umpire’s call. The first decision always counts, not the second one. So he went for the replay, and it was not out. That’s what happened. But I think there are a few areas from this game that will need review to fine-tune the rules," Jayasuriya said.Here’s what rule 20.1.1.3 of the rule book says: “The ball is dead when a batter is dismissed. The ball will be deemed to be dead from the instant of the incident causing the dismissal.”This meant that despite the batter being clearly run out, the ball was deemed dead the moment Sanju completed the catch and the umpire gave it out.
Article Summary: Sri lanka coach sanath jayasuriya praises abhishek sharma and pathum nissanka. He questions the "grey areas" in cricket after a controversial super over incident in the last super four match of the asia cup. In the super over, drama unfolded with a bizarre incident. Arshdeep singh struck on the first ball, dismissing kusal perera.
